Terms & Conditions


Website: www.igniteandascend.com
 Owner: Ignite and Ascend ("we", "our", "us")

By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions ("Terms"). If you do not agree, please do not use the Website.

 

 

1. Use of the Website

You agree to use this Website for lawful purposes only. You shall not:

  • Use the Website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.

  • Post or transmit any material that is defamatory, obscene, abusive, or otherwise objectionable.

  • Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion or feature of the Website.

 

 

2. Intellectual Property

All content on this Website—including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, videos, and digital downloads—is the property of Ignite and Ascend and is protected by applicable intellectual property laws.

You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without prior written permission.

 

 

3. Services and Products

We offer coaching, consultancy, workshops, digital courses, and other business-related services. All purchases or enrollments are subject to our separate Refund Policy (available on request or as published).

We reserve the right to modify, discontinue, or update any service at any time without notice.

 

 

4. Payment and Pricing

All prices listed on the Website are in Indian Rupees (INR), unless otherwise specified. We reserve the right to modify prices or discontinue any service without prior notice.

 

 

5. User Submissions

By submitting any content (e.g., testimonials, feedback, inquiries), you grant us the right to use, reproduce, and share it for promotional and operational purposes unless explicitly stated otherwise.

 

 

6. Third-Party Links

Our Website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy practices, or terms of those websites.

 

 

7. Limitation of Liability

We do our best to provide accurate and up-to-date content. However, we make no warranties regarding the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of the information provided.

Ignite and Ascend shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of or inability to use the Website or services.

 

 

8. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Ignite and Ascend and its affiliates from any claims, losses, or liabilities arising from your use of the Website, violation of these Terms, or infringement of any third-party rights.

 

 

9. Termination

We reserve the right to restrict or terminate your access to the Website at any time, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users or us.

 

 

10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Bangalore, Karnataka, India.

 

 

11. Changes to These Terms

We reserve the right to update or change these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Website constitutes your acceptance of any modifications.

 

 

12. Contact Us

If you have questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at:

  • Email: info.igniteandascend@gmail.com

  • Phone: +91 7899790978

  • Address: Bangalore, India

Refund and Cancellation Policy

 

At Ignite and Ascend, we are committed to delivering high-quality services, trainings, and digital products. Before making a purchase, we request you to carefully review the details of the service or program.

 

 

1. No Refund Policy

All sales made through www.igniteandascend.com are final.
We do not offer refunds for:

  • Coaching programs

  • Workshops, webinars, or live sessions

  • Digital downloads or online courses

  • Consulting services

  • Any other paid offering

Once a payment is made, it confirms your commitment and participation. No refunds will be issued under any circumstances, including:

  • Change of mind

  • Personal scheduling conflicts

  • Inability to attend live sessions

  • Partial use of the service

 

 

2. No Cancellations

Once a booking, registration, or purchase has been completed, it cannot be cancelled. Please make sure you fully understand the service or product before completing your purchase.

 

 

3. Exceptions

There are no exceptions to this policy. We encourage users to reach out with any questions before enrolling in a program or service to ensure it's the right fit for your goals.

 

 

4. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this policy or need assistance in understanding the offerings, please contact us:

  • Email: info.igniteandascend@gmail.com

  • Phone: +91 7899790978

 

 

This policy is displayed clearly to ensure transparency and fairness. By making a purchase on our Website, you acknowledge and agree to this Refund and Cancellation Policy.

Disclaimer:


The information provided on www.igniteandascend.com is for educational and informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, financial, or medical advice. We do not guarantee any specific results from our coaching, programs, or services, as outcomes depend on individual effort, background, and consistency. Testimonials shared are personal experiences and may not reflect typical results. We are not liable for any decisions or actions taken based on the content shared on this website. All information is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for the content of any external websites linked here. By using this website, you accept full responsibility for your actions and agree to this disclaimer. This disclaimer is subject to change without prior notice. Please review it regularly for updates.

Privacy Policy

 

Ignite and Ascend ("Company", "we", "our", or "us") operates the website www.igniteandascend.com ("Website"). We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with applicable Indian laws.

 

 

1. Collection of Information

We may collect the following types of information when you visit our Website or engage with our services:

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, city/state, business details, etc.

  • Sensitive Personal Data or Information (SPDI): We do not collect financial information (e.g., bank account, credit/debit card numbers) or biometric data.

  • Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device information, operating system, and usage data through cookies and similar technologies.

 

2. Purpose of Collection

We collect and use your information to:

  • Provide and improve our services

  • Respond to your queries and requests

  • Send newsletters, offers, and promotional content (with your consent)

  • Understand user behavior through analytics

  • Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

 

 

3. Consent

By using our Website and voluntarily submitting information, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

You can withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us (see Section 10), but please note that this may affect our ability to provide certain services to you.

 

 

4. Disclosure of Information

We may disclose your information:

  • To trusted third-party service providers who assist in running the Website or delivering services

  • To comply with applicable laws, court orders, or legal processes

  • To enforce our legal rights or protect our users and systems

We do not sell or rent your personal information to any third party.

 

 

5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies to:

  • Improve website functionality

  • Track website usage and traffic patterns

  • Remember your preferences

You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings, although doing so may affect website functionality.

 

 

6. Data Security

We take reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, misuse, or alteration. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

 

 

7. Retention of Information

We retain personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, or as required by applicable laws.

 

 

8. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access, update, or correct your personal information

  • Withdraw consent (if applicable)

  • Request deletion of your data (unless retention is required by law)

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at the details below.

 

 

9. Children's Privacy

Our Website is not intended for use by children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

 

 

10. Contact Us

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact:

  • Email: info.igniteandascend@gmail.com

  • Phone: +91 7899790978

  • Address: Bangalore, India

 

11. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with a revised “Effective Date.” Please review this page periodically.

 

 

Note: This Privacy Policy is in accordance with Indian data protection regulations. If you serve users outside India (e.g., EU, UK, Canada), you may need to include additional compliance clauses such as GDPR or PIPEDA.
